segments.text: Do you have anything to declare ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have a camera and three bottles of whisky .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK . You'll have to pay duty for the whisky .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , where shall I pay the duty for the whisky ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Please wait a moment . I'll make out the duty memo . Here you are . Take this and pay the people over there .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I've paid the duty . Here is the receipt
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Very well . I hope you'll enjoy your stay in China .
segments.speaker: S1
